function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variable interpretations of social distancing measures by governments and local authorities","Impact":"Increased risk of inconsistent and ineffective containment of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide clear and standardized guidelines for social distancing measures, along with regular updates and monitoring of compliance","Technologies":"Communication and surveillance technologies for monitoring and enforcing social distancing measures","People":"Public and government officials","Owner":"Government health agencies and policymakers"},{"Description":"Avoidance or resistance to individual social distancing practices","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagion spread and difficulty in controlling outbreaks","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of social distancing, provision of support for remote work, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Communication and education technologies for spreading awareness and remote work facilitation","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations and community leaders"},{"Description":"Closure of public facilities and institutions as part of social distancing measures","Impact":"Disruption of daily life and economic activities, leading to social and economic challenges","Mitigation":"Implementation of support programs for affected businesses and individuals, development of alternative service delivery methods, and resource allocation for affected communities","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote services, financial support systems, and virtual communication tools","People":"Business owners, employees, and the general public","Owner":"Government and local authorities"}]}
